comments: He is an awesome teacher. He is extremely helpful and never treats you like you\'re stupid. He has study guides and powerpoints to make everything easier.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Morrow is great. He is very helpful and encourages you to look for Geography in other areas of life. Super friendly and very willing go the extra mile in order to help students do their best in the course. I would definitely recommend his classes.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Great Professor! I\'m not even interested in geology, and he made it interesting. He provides copies of all his power point slides so you know exactly what is going to be on all of his tests... no suprises. Overall, outstanding!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He\'s an AMAZING teacher, and I\'d recommend him to anyone! I\'m actually considering changing my major to Geology now. I\'m SO taking him for GY112!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Morrow is just a great guy. He tries really hard to teach you the basics of geology. It\'s pretty interesting too, and this is coming from a non-major.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very good teacher. Makes a boring subject interesting. Uses power points for lecture and gives students a copy, so not a lot of note-taking required. Tests are much easier if you don\'t skip class! Dr. Morrow is very nice and very helpful. I would recommend his classes to anyone!

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Good teacher. Very professional and prepared. Recommended.
